item.title: What Is Declarative?
item.description: According to wiki Declarative programming means a style of building the structure and elements of computer programs — that expresses the logic of a computation without describing its control flow Control flow in here means all kind of if-then-else, switch, loops I suddenly jump out of this question when I come across react-fns’s readme. It say: Browser API’s turned into declarative React components and HoC Are React components must be declarative?
